QuestData.Title: Dust to Dust
QuestData.Description: If we are to make camp here, we cannot leave all of these yaungol bodies lying to rot.$B$BTake this torch and set fire to the villagers' corpses.$B$BThe incense from the torch should purify the earth and air around them as well.$B$BEven our enemies deserve to be laid to rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Shado-Pan Torch on 20 Palewind Villagers.
QuestData.CompletionText: The stench of death is overpowering.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $n.$B$BHopefully, their spirits are in a better place.
